{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Virgin media hub 3 primary.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Virgin Media Hub 3 |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://store.virginmedia.com/discover/broadband/explore/fast-wireless.html |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Virgin_Media_Super_Hub_3 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Virgin Media |model = Super Hub |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = 3 (VMDG505) |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, cable modem, analog phone gateway, |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = UIDTG2492 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel Puma;DHCE2652;Puma 6 (SR278); |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = x86-64 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz <!-- 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S34ML01G200TFI00; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B2G1646Q-BCKO; |ram1_num = 2 |ram2type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram2type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram2spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram2size = 256 |ram2chip = Micron;MT41K128M16JT-125:K; |ram2_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Broadcom;BCM53124S;BCM53124SKMMLG; |cm_down_c = 24 |cm_up_c = 8 |docsisver = 3.0 |voip_ports = |wan_ports = <!-- 1 --> |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = DOCSIS 3.0, analog phone port, TR-069, |addchip = <!-- Teardown !! --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Arris |manuf_model = TG2492LG |manuf_rev = -VM |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 09/27/2016 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9382;AR9382-AL1A; |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9880; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1300 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== This device is an ''[[Arris]]'' VMDG505 / TG2492LG-VM distributed by ''{{Used by service|Virgin Media}}'' within Europe.
{{WiFiCert|WFA60819|06/15/2015}} :24x8 DOCSIS 3.0
Arris FCC entry shows internal photos for a TG2492 and a TG2492S. *'''Arris TG2492S''' • [http://www.arris.com/products/touchstone-telephony-gateway-tg2492-s/ PPage] • [http://www.arris.com/globalassets/resources/data-sheets/tg2492s3.pdf Datasheet] TG2492S has 2x [[Samsung]] RAM chips instead of ''Micron'' in TG2492.
==Links of Interest== ===Teardown=== *[https://www.mobile-computer-repairs.co.uk/blog/topic/29/routers/Arris-TG2492 ''VM Super Hub 3 (Arris TG2492) Teardown'' on '''MCR''' blog] *[http://www.haxorware.com/forums/showthread.php?tid=4450&pid=30686 ''Arris TG2492LG-VM (VMDG505)'' on '''HaxorWare''' forums]
===Reviews=== *[https://www.techradar.com/reviews/virgin-media-super-hub-3 ''Virgin Media Super Hub 3 Review'' on '''TechRadar'''] *[https://community.virginmedia.com/t5/Gaming-Support/Superhub-3-0-CPU-Issue-year-later-and-no-fix/td-p/3537028 ''Super Hub 3.0 CPU Issue'' on '''VM''' forums] :CPU: [[Intel Puma]] 6 (DHCE2652) @1.2GHz
==See also== :[[Virgin Media]] • [[Arris]] • [[Netgear]] • [[Intel Puma]] • [[Broadcom]] • [[QCA]] *[[Virgin Media Super Hub 1]] - Netgear CG3101D (VMDG480) • *[[Virgin Media Super Hub 2]] - Netgear CG4000TD (VMDG485) • *[[Virgin Media Super Hub 2ac]] - [[Netgear]] (VMDG490/SH2AC) • [https://www.techradar.com/reviews/pc-mac/networking-and-wi-fi/modem-routers/virgin-media-super-hub-2ac-1293173/review Review] *[[Virgin Media Super Hub 3]] - [[Arris]] TG2492LG (VMDG505) • [https://www.techradar.com/reviews/virgin-media-super-hub-3 Review]
